title: How to exercise
brief_description: Knight Light sets out to fight the dragon but neither is fit for battle. The sorceress of Physical Fitness appears with a shapeup plan for the two weaklings including lessons in the proper way to exercise. Demostrates warm up activities, planning specific exercises, developing routines and setting goals of progression.
